attributes.action: ensure his Press Briefings actually answer questions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too often, the Prime Minister's Spokesperson gives an insultingly evasive answer (eg. the irrelevant "the PMS said that the Prime Minister was focusing on the state of public services, the economy and the safety and security of our streets" and "the PMS said that the Prime Minister was focusing on his job, which was running the Government and being the Prime Minister of the country"). Rarely is useful information given out.

rejection.details: Rather than creating a petition we suggest you write an email addressed to the Press Office. https://email.number10.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
